speaker: char
text: Darling, I come bearing wonderful news. This last date of mine? Turns out she’s blind!

speaker: char
text: I know, what a marvelous turn of events, I couldn’t be happier. We talked all night and she didn’t turn into any shade of gray!

speaker: char
text: Feel free to do whatever you want on this last makeup! It truly doesn’t matter what it looks like.
